name: Air Fried Maple Chicken Thighs
author: thedailygourmet
summary: This subtly sweet, yet savory, chicken thigh recipe is crisped to perfection in an air fryer.
ingredients: ½ teaspoon honey powder (such as Savory Spice®)
directions: Combine buttermilk, maple syrup, egg, and 1 teaspoon granulated garlic in a resealable bag
Add chicken thighs and marinate for at least 1 hour or up to overnight in the refrigerator
Combine flour, tapioca flour, salt, sweet paprika, smoked paprika, granulated onion, pepper, cayenne pepper, 1/2 teaspoon granulated garlic, and honey powder in a shallow bowl
Preheat an air fryer to 380 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Drain and discard marinade from chicken thighs
Dredge chicken through flour mixture and shake off excess
Place chicken skin-side down in the preheated air fryer and cook for 12 minutes
Turn thighs and fry an additional 13 minutes
